task.title: Querying JES jobs and viewing related status in JES Explorer
task.shortdesc: Use the Job Entry Subsystem (JES) Explorer to query JES jobs with filters and view the related status.

step.cmd: Click the Start menu on Zowe Desktop.

image.alt: the start menu of Zowe desktop

step.cmd: Scroll down to find the JES Explorer icon and click to open it.
Click the Job Filters column to expand the filter criteria. You can filter jobs on various criteria by Owner, Prefix, Job ID, and Status. By default, the jobs are filtered by Owner.
To query the jobs starting with ZOWE and in an active status, enter ZOWE* in the Prefix field and select ACTIVE from the Status drop-down list, and click APPLY.

info.note: Wildcard is supported. Valid wildcard characters are asterisk (*), percent sign (%), and question mark (?).

step.cmd: From the job filter results, click the job ZOWECRF:STC01414[ACTIVE].
step.info: The data sets for this job are listed.

step.cmd: Click JESJCL to open the JESJCL data set.
step.info:
The contents of this data set are displayed. You can also select other data sets to view their contents. You can hover over the text to display a hover help window.
hover help

taskbody.result: You used the JES Explorer to query the JES jobs with filters and viewed the related steps, files, and status.
taskbody.postreq: Next, you'll use the TN3270 application plug-in in Zowe Desktop to view the same job that you viewed in this task.
